channel.title: Moparscape Down...?
channel.description: This pic speaks for itself =( [IMG]http://i490.photobucket.com/albums/rr265/cheese1111/Capture-6.png[/img] It is under attack, and It doesn't show anything more. Can I please get more info on the attack? Can a mod move to General Site Discussion please?

dragonfire455 it doesn’t take much to realise you’re always the clueless one in these stupid arguments you keep having with everyone

item.title: Moparscape Down...?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

io9:

io9 eh? Never heard of him.

[quote=“io9, post:48, topic:278023”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=366966.msg2783545#msg2783545 date=1242329871]

I could try and infiltrate T_X, but that would involve me saying that I will crash this site though :S
I may also post a topic saying “Time to go down!!!” and then I will get the Botnet, and give you it. Will that do?
[/quote]Pinging them with CMD doesn’t really do anything.

Being a clueless fuck in response to clueless fuck makes you quite the clueless fuck.[/quote]How the fuck did that make me a clueless fuck, when I told a joke, you fuck?

Didnt you know that rune server without spaces cannot be in the filter.

Can I get a link to any infected files? Or do you know where his bots are controlled from?
[/quote]
I can give you his MSN/Skype but that’s about all I know other than he possesses the bot and is testing it on MSCP.[/quote]

Alright, give me all you have on him.

*removed, I don’t think people need to read my private messages at this time. (Why are you putting it on the Internet then?, and make it easy searchable?)
Found something that may have something with the case to do: http://eatddos.info/palidino76-bots.txt

seems that guy is myself.
